# category

**Instance Property**

The current audio session category.

## Declaration

```swift
var category: AVAudioSession.Category { get }
```

## Discussion

An audio session category defines a set of audio behaviors for your app. The default category assigned to an audio session is [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/Category-swift.struct/soloAmbient].

## Inspecting the category configuration

- **availableCategories**: The audio session categories available on the current device.
- **AVAudioSession.Category**: Audio session category identifiers.
- **categoryOptions**: The set of options associated with the current audio session category.
- **AVAudioSession.CategoryOptions**: Constants that specify optional audio behaviors.
